meanings.definition: A region or province in Russia or other former Soviet republics.
meanings.sent1: In Russia, the oblasts are similar to provinces.
meanings.sent2: The oblasts in Ukraine have their own local governments.
meanings.sent3: The oblasts decided to have a friendly competition to see who could grow the biggest pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: The oblasts stood as pillars of strength during the challenging times.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flags of the oblasts fluttered in the wind, marking their distinct territories.

meanings.definition: The administrative division of a country.
meanings.sent1: Each oblasts has its own set of rules and regulations.
meanings.sent2: The oblasts play a crucial role in the governance of the nation.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, the oblasts started arguing over who had the fanciest official seal.
meanings.sent4: The oblasts are the building blocks that form the nation's administrative structure.
meanings.sent5: The boundaries of the oblasts are carefully outlined on the map for easy reference.
